attributes.action: Check for COVID 19 for appropriate amount of time at UK departures and Arrivals
attributes.additional_details: This would significantly reduce people to have COVID-19 as people are getting checked. People who get tested positive should be put into quarantine for appropriate amount of time. This would also be helpful to other countries as it reduces the spread
attributes.background: Checks at airports for departure and arrivals for all passengers against COVID-19

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The conduct of tests is a clinical decision for the NHS, not the UK Government or Parliament.

We have published a petition calling for all UK airports and seaports to be closed to prevent further spreading of coronavirus, which you might like to sign: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300932

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
